intension: Create an Instagram story showcasing the winter landscape and promoting Alpine Adventures. The text 'The best weather ever' adds to the idea of an enjoyable winter travel experience.
globalcaption: The image features a snowy mountain with a large snowflake in the foreground. The snowflake is positioned in the center of the image, covering a significant portion of the frame. The mountain is visible in the background, with its peak covered in snow. The scene captures the essence of a winter wonderland, with the snowflake adding a touch of magic to the landscape.
keywords: adventure, mountains, nature, range, snow, travel, white, wilderness, wildlife, winter, landscape, story, instagram, ig, insta

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a snowy mountain with a large, white snowflake prominently displayed in the foreground. The snowflake is positioned in the center of the scene, covering a significant portion of the image. The mountainous background is covered in snow, creating a serene and wintry atmosphere

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a white background with a large, intricate design made up of many small lines. The design resembles a snowflake pattern, with the lines radiating outwards from the center in a circular shape. The overall appearance of the image is visually appealing and artistic
